website_summaries.verdict: A durable brown leather sheath. Most people appreciate its quality, but potential buyers should make sure it would fit their knife first.
pros: Includes no logo, which some users prefer
cons: It may not fit knives that aren't Ka-Bar

customer_reviews.title: Supple leather - read me
customer_reviews.text: Some reviews are negative for quality. The problem isn't really a problem. Its supple leather. Take it easy at first and let the knife break it in before using it. Slowly work the blade in without forcing. If it doesn't fit all the way in, let it sit half way in and wait a day or two. Push it a bit more each day until fully seated. Let it sit for a week. It will be perfect. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Siegler

customer_reviews.title: This sheath is made from quality leather and is a good fit for my 7 inch knife.
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers have mentioned, I purchased this sheath to hold the Old Hickory OH77 7 inch knife. I was skeptical but it fits the knife perfectly. I was also skeptical about the quality of this sheath, but on arrival the sheath was made of very good quality leather and looked to be very sturdy with a very nice belt loop strap. The belt is made in Mexico which is good because Mexico has an established tradition of making fine leather goods including boots and belts, etc. This product looks better in person than the picture. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: John3

customer_reviews.title: High quality + low price = incredible value
customer_reviews.text: Very well-made knife sheath. Incredible value due to low price. I bought it for a knife that wasn't the 7" Ka-Bar but it still fit pretty well. My 6" Cattaraugus G.I. knife sits a half-centimeter high in the sheath when it's snapped in with the handle strap, but a perfectly reasonable fit. I'm sure this thing is a snug and perfect fit for the 7" Ka-Bar, and it's a surprisingly sturdy and well constructed sheath.
customer_reviews.author: Ari Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Perfect value priced sheath.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Ontario 7025 7-inch butcher knife. The fit for the blade is excellent. The snap is loose because the sheath is really meant for a Ka-Bar handle, but the knifes stays snug. The leather construction is excellent and should be perfect for this knife.
customer_reviews.author: Tom in Utah

customer_reviews.title: Top quality product . . .
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a good leather sheath (never have liked the nylon ones) for quite some time. Most of the ones I've come across were made from, what I call, cheap "cardboard" leather with substandard stitching and no additional reinforcement. This Ka-Bar sheath, however, is just what I needed to replace the original one that fell apart after 49 years of hard use. It is made in Mexico with quality leather and is well reinforced. And, it's very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Performs as/better than expected
customer_reviews.text: bought it for a costume. Seems like it would fit most standard 7" fixed blade knives, even if it is marketed as a sheath for a Ka-Bar. I'm currently using it with a rubber training knife I'll be dolling up for a prop and it fits like a charm. Leather is solid and feels like it will hold up well, since I'll probably pop my hunting knife into it once the costume bit is over. A little saddle soap to soften it and add some flexibility and this is a keeper. Good purchase. would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: James Innocent

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Item was just as described. It's an original Ka-Bar sheath without the USMC logo that comes with the knife. I wanted to have a logo-less one. Now I have 2 ''. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: BEST AT THIS PRICE !!!
customer_reviews.text: Shopped for hours on many websites, and came back to this. There is NO problem with it's construction, quality, looks, etc. It will fit a true 7" blade...used it to help restore family WW2 military issue knife. It's a good looking leather craft .I recommend this! (Knife in the image has a 6" blade)
customer_reviews.author: Motifxs6

customer_reviews.title: Beyond excellent quality. Much better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Beyond excellent quality. Much better than I expected. Funny enough, I bought this for sheath for an Old Hickory brand butcher knif instead of a KBar. It fits like it was made for it. I got this idea from a Youtube video and with this sheath and an Old Hickory butcher knife you get an solid bushcraft utility knife for under $25.00
customer_reviews.author: Spencer T Scott

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, budget minded and tough
customer_reviews.text: Great budget sheath, appears to match the quality of most factory brand knives. Perfectly good for a bitch knife or other variety, I buy sheaths for many knives and come back to this one when I have a hard to fit knife.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s whatever
customer_reviews.text: Look nice but bare edged raw genuine leather. Genuine leather is actually the cheapest grain of leather branded genuine because it’s so cheap and brittle that they want people to know it’s real leather and not fake.. FYI
customer_reviews.author: Don't worry about it..

customer_reviews.title: ... was a genuine Ka-Bar sheathe and it looks just amazing and my old hickory butcher knife fits beautifully in ...
customer_reviews.text: didnt realize it was a genuine Ka-Bar sheathe and it looks just amazing and my old hickory butcher knife fits beautifully in it. loop is a little high on the "hickory butchery" but thats not Ka-Bars fault nor is it ontario's. great sheathe i know i'll get a lifetime out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jake9217

customer_reviews.title: Wow Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to have a leather sheath made for my Old Hickory but didnt want to spend 50 or more to have one made. and I kept seeing stuff on YouTube about this sheath, OMG BUY THIS SHEATH! Its cheap and very well made!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great sheathe, with photos!
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick leather. Still flexible but feels durable and is well stitched and riveted. Fits the old hickory butcher/bushman knife by ontario knife co. great just as others have said.
customer_reviews.author: Darth Chester

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the Ontario Knife 42923 Knife. Fits perfectly. Decent quality. Didn't want a high end sheath for a $12 knife. This holds my general purpose camp knife and does it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Eckert

customer_reviews.title: Decent leather but very smelly
customer_reviews.text: Got it for the Old Hickory 7-incher and it does fit well. However ... Mine has a slick waxy coating and smells strongly of a silicone leather treatment. I'm wondering if I got one that someone treated and then returned.
customer_reviews.author: Science Boy

customer_reviews.title: Tough, holds Old hickory perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Fits the Old Hickory 7" butcher knife perfectly. If you are still using the original Old Hickory handle (who still is?) then the handle will be be little loose when snapped, but it won't go anywhere. It's a tough piece of leather and saves me the time of making my own sheath.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Thats fine cause im an ex squid
customer_reviews.text: I had cut my usmc sheath onaccident so this was a cheap replaciment. Same quality as my original but doesnt have usmc on it. Thats fine cause im an ex squid. Very happy and reccomend to anyone who needs a quality replacement without spending too much. Got here early too!
customer_reviews.author: Dazed and confused

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 7 in KA-BAR knife
customer_reviews.text: Blade fits the sheath but the buckle which is supposed to hold the knife in place does not fit around handle of knife. I would seriously recommend looking elsewhere for an appropriate sheath if you have one of the default 7 inch KA-BAR knives.
customer_reviews.author: Grace V.

customer_reviews.title: Very thick and sturdy. I bought this to house a beautiful and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very thick and sturdy. I bought this to house a beautiful and extraordinary hand-made fishing knife, and it worked perfectly. The quality is good and it fit well, according to its stated dimensions. And it looked very nice - didn't diminish the beauty of the knife, which I had been concerned about. It's a very nice product and I'd buy one again.
customer_reviews.author: JVal

customer_reviews.title: Oiled the leather strap to fit the handle into sheath.
customer_reviews.text: I liked how it could safely and securely hold my drywall knife. Will make the tool last longer and help avoid being cut by a serrated blade.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer and Producer

customer_reviews.title: Good sheath at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great sheath should fit any kabar style 7 inch blade leather quality is good it's made in Mexico it could be a little stiffer but I soften to mind with newts foot oil to darken the color to make it match my antique Ontario Knife... I was not looking for the very common USMC stamped sheath and this was right up my alley
customer_reviews.author: Bobby scott jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great sheath for the Old Hickory
customer_reviews.text: Like many others have commented, bought this to pair with my Old Hickory knife. It’s a great option and happy I saw this and the reviews on it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Fits my knife
customer_reviews.text: Found an old Kabar 6in knife of my grandfathers. Went with the hard plastic 6in one which got mangled because of how tight it was. Grabbed this instead and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepy Lion

customer_reviews.title: Will not fit a Ka-Bar 7 inch knife
customer_reviews.text: Knife fit into sheath ok but keeper is about 1 inch too short to buckle....sent back, returned...cheap made
customer_reviews.author: Geo B

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Sturdy, Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Very well made sheath, I bought it for a costume and I used thisas the knife so it was snug since it's not a real blade but I'm sure a standard blade will fit well within it. It unfortunately does not have any way to tie down the pointed end but considering how sturdy this is, I do not foresee a sharp blade fighting you to get in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: The snaps and rivots are painted brown for some reason. Wish I’d noticed that. They’re also rivets, as opposed to the original WWII sheathes that had staples. Was trying to go for the original look. Nobody else will notice it but it irks me. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: thad

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit. Well made sheath.
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping as well. Unfortunately the knife I put in it has since been stolen along with the sheath. But on the bright side it wasn't a KaBar. It was a 1989 Case USMC knife though and those are like $30 on ebay.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Polaski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and authentically understated for its purpose. Great addition to my fathers WWII Kabar.
customer_reviews.author: John Guralny

customer_reviews.title: ... fit an off-brand 7" knife with my on handle beautifully. It had a very nice snug "lock" on ...
customer_reviews.text: This fit an off-brand 7" knife with my on handle beautifully. It had a very nice snug "lock" on the blade as well as the included handle strap with snap. I think this would fit most straight blade knives of the proper length, looks nice, and seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice sheath
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, I used it to sheath an Old Hickory knife
customer_reviews.author: GoCards

customer_reviews.title: Great knife sheath
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this blank faced leather sheath and it fits 3 of my knives with no issue. Great replacement for anybody looking for their old Ka-Bar or any blade that is 7 inches in length
customer_reviews.author: Spartan Kirk018

customer_reviews.title: Nice sheath, great price.  Bought for Ontario Knife OH77
customer_reviews.text: Nice sheath, great price. Bought for Ontario Knife OH77 and it fits that knife like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: JCSailor

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for an Old Hickory 7" Butcher
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price/value for an Old Hickory 7" Butcher knife. Nuf said! buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Mustang

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to match a knife made from the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to match a knife made from the Woodcraft "Tanto" hunting knife kit. It fit perfectly, though the snap closure over the handle was a bit tight for the handle I made. This was readily resolved by using neatsfoot oil and allowing the leather to dry while snapped on the knife with some tape wrapped over the handle to stretch the leather. I ordered a second for the another of the same knife kit.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sheath, without the U.S.M.C. brand on it. No stolen valor.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Description not accurate
customer_reviews.text: It advertised it fits all Ka-Bar 7 inch knife. Well not the Ka-Bar 7. Returning
customer_reviews.author: dutchman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Sheath is made from nice thick leather and quality built with strong stitching. It fits the Ontario 7025 Old Hickory 7" Butcher Knife perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: G@TW

customer_reviews.title: Very well made with thick leather
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my neighbor to sheath the knives I also purchased for him. Was very impressed with the quality of workmanship, thickness of the leather, and the heavy duty seams. I'd recommend this. Jim
customer_reviews.author: Jimnasium

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my old hickory knife works and looks good
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just love my freaking leather sheath! I can actually put my knife into it!!! Wow!!! Now, if I can only find a place to shop where I don't have to pat heads and babysit everyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sheath!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a sheath for a Ontario 7" butcher knife! For was perfect! Great quality for the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for Price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality leather and fits a fixed 7inch blade perfectly. I was so pleased with it I bought a second as a gift. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Ok replacement
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace my original WW2 sheath, which housed my Kabar USN knife. The original had been used hard. This sheath does not use the heavy leather of the original, but for the price its adequate since the knife has been retired. I would spend more if I could find a higher quality sheath.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: this is perfect and at a worthy price
customer_reviews.text: had an old K-Bar where I needed to replace the sheath ......... this is perfect and at a worthy price. Very hearty sheath, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Reburg

customer_reviews.title: Fits Like A Glove
customer_reviews.text: Not all of us want a military logo, or brand name. This item has no markings what-so-ever. It is good quality leather, and made to fit the Ka-Bar type military knives with 7 inch blades. An excellent replacement for the thin piece of garbage sheath that comes with the. A must have if you are always carrying a big knife.
customer_reviews.author: Inspector Nash Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my training knife and it was almost perfect for it. The knife was a little big but after getting the leather to stretch it fit perfectly. The only downside is the sheath was more of an Orange brown rather than a Dark Brown.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality leather sheath
customer_reviews.text: I bought on a suggestion that it would fit my knife and it did!! Good sewing and nice quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The brown leather looks like it was made for my butcher knife
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my old hickory butcher knife and it works well. The Ka-bar has a finger guard unlike the old hickory so my knife can slide out. A paracord wrap around the handle remedied that. Well made sheath. Low priced. The brown leather looks like it was made for my butcher knife.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac A Monteleone

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: You cannot beat this for the money! Use a your favorite leather conditioner on the mid weight leather construction and add a bit of moleskin or felt over back side of inside snap that interfaces your knife handle. Rivets my be installed a bit shody but the sheath is only holding an 8.5 oz. knife right!?
customer_reviews.author: Winter

customer_reviews.title: Very decent sheath
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality sheath. Fits my 7" Ka-Bar perfectly. There are no markings or stamps on either side of the sheath. I'm very satisfied with this sheath.
customer_reviews.author: ML1447

customer_reviews.title: Good sheath
customer_reviews.text: Fits pefectly for my old hickory 7' butcher knife which I also ordered on amazon and plan to use as all purpose camp knife. Plain brown leather, no logo, and doesn't feel cheap for $10.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Good enough!
customer_reviews.text: Well, the sheath is not exactly expensive though made of leather. Smells new a little bit after gasoline, but I washed that out and treated the leather with some nice oil. And it's true, the Old Hickory 7" butcher knife fits in there as if the sheath would have been made for it. Cool!
customer_reviews.author: Jochen D. Feuerlein

customer_reviews.title: Great sheath for your Old Hickory 7" Butcher Knife
customer_reviews.text: Great quality sheath at a very reasonable price. Very sturdy, thick leather. Quality sticking and worksmanship. Made in Mexico, but I'd buy it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: What a waste.
customer_reviews.text: Stitching fell apart before i even got to use it in the field. I would've fixed it but then the leather started to crack and split apart. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: D. C.

customer_reviews.title: Bought Old Hickory knife which fits it just fine. This will protect the blade really well
customer_reviews.text: Bought Old Hickory knife which fits it just fine. This will protect the blade really well. Sheath is made well and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.E. Recommended purchase

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my Old Hickory knife - perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: I had picked up an Old Hickory knife and replaced the handle. I needed a good sheath and this fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality build.
customer_reviews.text: No issues at all. This leather item is well built and right for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Cantu

customer_reviews.title: No fit for Camillus USMC Fighting Knife 7”
customer_reviews.text: Will not fit with a Camillus made USMC MK II 7” knife as the strap is too small. Also the opening of the sheath is very small compared to the issue sheath. Bought this for a MK II that’s missing a sheath. See photos. Also this item not eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality however like everyone else said the button snap ...
customer_reviews.text: good quality however like everyone else said the button snap is way to short and certainly will not wrap around any good size handle especially a kbar etc.
customer_reviews.author: MrD

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good sheath for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good sheath for the money. Well made. I bought this for my 7" old Hickory Knife. It is an exact fit!
customer_reviews.author: Luther H

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: pretty nice little sheath.. fits the 7" old hickory just like it was meant for it
customer_reviews.author: Michael Moody

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for my KA-BAR 1211. I lost the original one (Hard plastic) about a year ago. I actually prefer this one over the original. I will update review after a few weeks/months to see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Works great, although the buckle to keep the handle in ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, although the buckle to keep the handle in place needed a little stretching at first it works great now!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan M.

customer_reviews.title: And best of all not expensive to put together these two ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit my Ontario Knife 7025-7 inch butcher knife perfectly. All around food knife for camping/outing. And best of all not expensive to put together these two and works very well
customer_reviews.author: sampsonkat

customer_reviews.title: Good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for the Ontario sp1 and the Ontario butcher knife. Works well enough and it's a good deal for under ten bucks.
customer_reviews.author: BladeNut

customer_reviews.title: surpasses my minimum requirements
customer_reviews.text: Good quality leather, 7 rivets, with tight stitching, and a small hole near the point to attach a lanyard/thigh string. I use it to hold a Keene 907-6 fillet knife I bought for a dollar at goodwill
customer_reviews.author: Richard B

customer_reviews.title: and I was not disappointed with the product in the least
customer_reviews.text: The sheath arrived very quickly, and I was not disappointed with the product in the least. It was well made and fit my knife very well. The only question I have is whether it is safe to store my knife in the sheath, since leather may corrode steel, depending on the tanning process. To err on the side of caution, I do not store the knife in the sheath. But, whenever I need to carry my knife, I have a sheath I can be proud to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fits snug as a glove perfect
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product a 5 star rating because I believe it is well made and it fits very snug and secure in it and it feels like it will last a long time compared to a Velcro strap that will eventually wear out.
customer_reviews.author: calvin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for ontario 7025 knife. Great materials and construction
customer_reviews.author: shop20

customer_reviews.title: Good sheath.
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive leather sheath. Works well, good leather and no frills.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great Sheath,
customer_reviews.text: Great sheath for the money. Have purchased several of them for different knives I have put together... Wish they made them for 5" & 6" blades
customer_reviews.author: Hk

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this item for use with a KA-BAR knife ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for use with a KA-BAR knife. It fits well & I use it often when I go hiking in the woods
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Drollinger

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a cheap full-tang knife I bought and wrapped myself with paracord. The original knife came with a cloth sheath which obviously is ridiculous to carry it around in. This is perfect and looks great with the paracord handle on the knife.
customer_reviews.author: Cap'n

customer_reviews.title: Fits Old Hickory 7 inch butcher.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sheath for Old Hickory 7 inch butcher as talked about in bushcraft forums. Fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Richard K.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sheath for the Ontario 7 inch butcher knife. All leather and solid construction. and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Aholyfield

customer_reviews.title: It looks a little sad with that skinny old-hickory blade in it but it ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits the old hickory budget knife I got just right. It looks a little sad with that skinny old-hickory blade in it but it works perfectly for it what I wanted. i.e. a budget bushcraft wannabe / camping setup.
customer_reviews.author: mark t gross

customer_reviews.title: This is non-marked/no logo version...
customer_reviews.text: Same as other kabar but plain, which is fine and I wanted that way, just an FYI. Great sheath, basic good thick gauge leather with riveting. Any 7" or any that resemble dimensions of a kabar usmc knife will fit.
customer_reviews.author: kbgulfcoast

customer_reviews.title: Good quality replacement for a WWII original sheath
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. Purchased as a replacement for a WWII Kabar original sheath that was a bit worn with a broken snap. Product was very close in every respect with the original. Good quality at a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Crisb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sheath !
customer_reviews.text: High Quality Sheath. Thick leather, stitched well. Affordable. Fits my 7" Old Hickory butcher knife perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a costume and it’s perfect. Very well made and looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: nice leather.
customer_reviews.text: great replacement for my Kabar, and works with my old hickory butcher knife.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leather sheath
customer_reviews.text: I was quite surprised by the quality. They fit the Old Hickory butcher knife like they were made for it. Makes no sense to try and make a sheath when you can buy one for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sheath at a great price. Fits the Old Hickory butcher knife like it was made for it.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan_H

customer_reviews.title: Need a sheath
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Ontario butcher knife great good strong leather sheath
customer_reviews.author: john gigante

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to carry a modified Old Hickory. Sturdy leather & the smell is fantastic. When the zombies invade (& they will invade), what will you carry your knife in? If you're smart, it will be one of these.
customer_reviews.author: MarkC

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY SHEATH
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like my k-bar sheath without the logo. Same good quality. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DLWFL

customer_reviews.title: Great product @ a great price
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I had expected, well made with heavy leather.. a perfect fit for my "old hickory butcher knife" !!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: This feels like a good quality leather
customer_reviews.text: This feels like a good quality leather. It is well treated and supple. It is a product of Mexico indicated by the sticker on the sheath. I am using it to hold a 6-inch blade Bowie-type blade, which it does firmly.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: ... use with an Old Hickory 7 inch butcher knife perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use with an Old Hickory 7 inch butcher knife perfect fit.

customer_reviews.title: still excellent in regards to quality
customer_reviews.text: OEM KA-BAR sheath, while not made in the US, still excellent in regards to quality.

customer_reviews.title: Great for 7" Old Hickory
customer_reviews.text: I took a gamble and it fits my Old Hickory knife perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Old Hickory Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits the Old Hickory butcher knife like it was designed for it. Great bush-craft addition.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit is nice for old Hickey
customer_reviews.text: Fit is nice for old Hickey. I believe it to be well made. Have to use it some before can say much more. I would buy again from what I do know.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for my Old Hickory and was very inexpensive
customer_reviews.author: John E. Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Works great for this purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the Old Hickory butcher knife so I can carry it in the field. Works great for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Man

customer_reviews.title: Very large, but good quality
customer_reviews.text: way too wide for the filet knife, but it will have to do
customer_reviews.author: P. Polzin

customer_reviews.title: The sheath is of a good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this sheath for an Ontario 7 inch Old Hickory Butcher knife. The blade fits very well, but will slip out when inverted. The sheath is of a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: GentleVandal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just received today, but seems to be well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Scout78013

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sheath to fit the 7" Old Hickory Butcher Knife. It is a great fit. Good value for a leather sheath. I haven't had a chance to take it out in the field and abuse it yet, but the stitching and construction seem solid.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Weber

product_meta.title: Ka-Bar Leather Sheath, 7-Inch, Brown
product_meta.description: KA-BAR Knives, Inc., a subsidiary of Alcas Corporation, manufactures high quality military, hunting, sporting, and all-purpose utility knives. KA-BAR Knives are a favorite of adventurers, survivalists, outdoor sportsmen and, of course, knife collectors who know that their knife deserves a place in their collection. .
feature_bullets: Fits all full size 7" fixed blade Ka-Bar knives.
Sheath for knives has a brown exterior.
